column17:
Product Description

This delicious 100% Pure Almond & Honey Body Scrub instantly makes your skin soft smooth healthy glowing and vibrant. The scrub is highly concentrated with skin nourishing ingredients and Apricot & Walnut Shells. It is a cleansing scrub that gently exfoliates and cleans your skin with soft Almonds natural Honey Aloe Vera and Rose water leaving your skin simply sumptuous. Honey has been used since ancient times to gently clean and moisturize the body. It gently sweeps away dead skin cells and revitalizes the skin.
